title: kaNDunnai kumbiDavum
sahitya:
kaNDunnai kumbiDavum kANikkai vENDumO kanakasabhai arasE


anupallavi

  peNDu piLLaikku varam pera nAn varavillaiyE piriyAmal un paNi puriyum eLiya toNDan


caraNam    pADip-paravashamAi ADi unnaik-koNDADum bhattarin pittanE parindu ponnum maNiyum
kOTi kOTiyAgak-koTTik-koDukka valla kOmAnE selva sImAnE shivanE
